newsitem.title: GERMANY: Sanacorp seeks alliance with Anzag, Herba.
newsitem.headline: Sanacorp seeks alliance with Anzag, Herba.

text.p: Newly listed drugs wholesaler Sanacorp Pharmahandel AG said on Thursday it was seeking an alliance with Andreae-Noris Zahn AG (Anzag) and Austria's Herba under a common holding company.
Sanacorp managing director Juergen Brink said that such a holding company would take over the strategic management of the three companies.
Brink said a merger with Anzag, in which Sanacorp owns 25 percent and has a further option on 14 percent, was also possible.
Brink also said Sanacorp, Germany's fourth largest drugs wholesaler, was mulling a further capital increase after its stock was floated on the Frankfurt stock exchange in October.
